Title: Pig
Writer: Sam Catlin (developed by), Seth Rogen (developed by), Evan Goldberg (developed by), Garth Ennis (based on the graphic novels by), Steve Dillon (based on the graphic novels by), Olivia Dufault
Actors: Dominic Cooper, Joseph Gilgun, Ruth Negga, Graham McTavish
Plot: Tulip confronts her near-death experience. Denis asks Cassidy for a major favor. Jesse questions the price of saving Cassidy and Tulip.
